title: Cheesy garlic bolognese beef pie
description: This cheap, easy recipe is ready in just 20 minutes and can be made entirely from frozen and storecupboard ingredients.
ingredients: 6 ready-made frozen cheesy garlic bread slices
100g/3½oz frozen chopped onion (or 1 medium onion, finely chopped)
250g/9oz frozen sliced courgettes (or 2 medium courgettes, trimmed, sliced)
200g/7oz frozen sliced mushrooms (or 200g/7oz fresh closed-cup mushrooms, sliced)
salt and freshly ground black pepper
